body:
### Wellcome

I am web programmer, technology fan and cinema addict, I like books (especially oldschool scifi), gadgets, hiking and history, sometimes I play guitar and shoot photos. Snowboard is my winter love. I love good food. I live online.

### My skills
- Web applications design & development
  - Ruby + Rails
  - PHP + frameworks (Yii, Nette, CodeIgniter)
  - Javascript + libs (jQuery, backbone.js)
  - HTML + CSS
- Server setup, deployment

### Contact me
- email: michal.valasek@gmail.com
- twitter: @michalvalasek
- skype: michalvalasek
name: Michal Valášek
